word:
MR No. 901 - Gather Up the Fragments

     One thing I know--my wrestling in Australia has been as severe as any place I was ever in. Now my work is not to attend large meetings and wrestle as I have done. The publication of books is urged upon me. That, with the articles for the papers, is enough. I have so much precious matter. Light came to me, you remember, before you left for America, "Gather up the fragments. Let nothing be lost." [See John 6:12.].--Letter 200, 1897, p. 3. (To W. C. White, Nov. 25, 1897.) 

White Estate Washington, D. C. December 10, 1981
